answers.answer: Most women fail the first test. You will do a three hour test next which is like the 1 hour test but you drink another liquid which is sweeter and get your blood tested every hour from 3 hours. You can't go anywhere and have to sit there for 3 hours.
Oh OK so it doesn't mean there is anything wrong.. Its normal
With my first pregnancy I failed the one hour test and passed the 3 hour test. Don't understand how you fail it then pass the other but the 3 hour one I hated doing

question: What does it mean when you fail the hr long diabetes test and does it mean there is something wrong?
title: diabetes test
